|====|
|NOTE|

I have scanned this file (look above |AVG SCAN|) with AVG Internet Security and its said to be clean, I do not take any responsibility what so ever if it turns out not to be, its up to you if you want to download it or not.

If you don't trust the AVG internet Security file in this download, you can just download it from the website instead and only download the "List of Serials.txt" file from here.

Serials are for AVG Internet Security 8.0.16, I am not sure if they work for any other version.

|===============|
|IMPORTANT FILES|
|===============|
1.avg_iswt_stf_en_8_164a1354.exe
2.List of Serials.txt

|===========|
|INFORMATION|
|===========|
As you can see (look below) the Internet Scurity version is a lot better as it gives the primary protection from Anti-Virus, and also internet protection.
Taken from http://www.avg.co.uk/uk.download-trial

|============|
|INSTRUCTIONS|
|============|
1. Install AVG Internet Security with the file "avg_iswt_stf_en_8_164a1354.exe". If you downloaded it from somewhere else, install from where you saved it.
2. Whilst in AVG Internet Security click on help on the top menu, then activate. Enter whatever you wish for your "Username", "Company" isn't needed, then enter one of the serials from the file "List of Serials.txt"
REMEMBER TO SCAN YOUR PC FOR VIRUS ATLEAST EVERY FEW DAYS.
